BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix semantic text match failure (#118790) * Fix semantic text match failure * Remove shard settings; only check for counts and not specific doc IDs

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Test queryable built-in role synchronization (#118964) Adds more tests for built-in roles synchronization, and fixes a bug where `synchronizationInProgress` hasn't been reset properly. Resolves https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/issues/118806

Test queryable built-in role synchronization (#118964) Adds more tests for built-in roles synchronization, and fixes a bug where `synchronizationInProgress` hasn't been reset properly. Resolves https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/issues/118806
